rows.label: qst202302_msg001
rows.name:
Okay, so let's say we head out and try
and find one of these deadly beasts...
Does anyone know where to find one?

rows.label: qst202302_msg002
rows.name: 'Fraid not.

rows.label: qst202302_msg003
rows.name: Not the Zekenator's area, I'm afraid.

rows.label: qst202302_msg004
rows.name: Not know!

rows.label: qst202302_msg005
rows.name: Ah... No.

rows.label: qst202302_msg006
rows.name:
Hey, come on! You must know of at least
one decent monster somewhere?

rows.label: qst202302_msg007
rows.name:
To be honest, I don't think about it all
that much.

rows.label: qst202302_msg008
rows.name:
You've gotta admit, finding a monster
that'll satisfy Yaegiri is gonna be
pretty tough. Impossible maybe.

rows.label: qst202302_msg009
rows.name: No doubt about it.

rows.label: qst202302_msg010
rows.name:
Huh?!
It sounds like you want to give up
before we even started!

rows.label: qst202302_msg011
rows.name:
Yeah, what a bunch of defeatists! I hate
to break it to you, but we're not
actually totally clueless here...

rows.label: qst202302_msg012
rows.name: Hikari... You know something...?

rows.label: qst202302_msg013
rows.name:
Well, I mean, it's kind of an old
rumor. Maybe it'll just turn out
to be a fairytale.

rows.label: qst202302_msg014
rows.name:
Anything's better than nothing!
Come on, tell us about it!

rows.label: qst202302_msg015
rows.name:
Back in the day, they say that there
was a monster with awesome power...
A king of the beasts, if you will...

rows.label: qst202302_msg016
rows.name:
But it was just too strong... No one
could defeat it...

rows.label: qst202302_msg017
rows.name:
In the end, even after many sacrifices,
the best the people of the time could
manage was to seal it away.

rows.label: qst202302_msg018
rows.name:
Yeah! That's the one I'm looking for
all right!

rows.label: qst202302_msg019
rows.name:
So... Now all I need to know is where
it is!

rows.label: qst202302_msg020
rows.name: I don't know.

rows.label: qst202302_msg021
rows.name:
Aww! You got me all worked up there!
"I don't know" just doesn't cut it,
Hikari!

rows.label: qst202302_msg022
rows.name:
Well, if I don't know, that's all I
can say! That's the way it goes.

rows.label: qst202302_msg023
rows.name:
But, Hikari... If your memory serves
you correctly, then surely there'll be a
record of it somewhere?

rows.label: qst202302_msg024
rows.name:
Ah... Maybe we could check out the
library at Teos Aure?

rows.label: qst202302_msg025
rows.name:
They've got heaps of old records
stuffed away there.

rows.label: qst202302_msg026
rows.name: Yeah?

rows.label: qst202302_msg027
rows.name: For realsies.

rows.label: qst202302_msg028
rows.name:
So we've gotta go there!
Thanks, Zeke!

rows.label: qst202302_msg029
rows.name:
I'll let you help me take on this vile
beast by way of thanks!

rows.label: qst202302_msg030
rows.name: No, it's fine...seriously...

rows.label: qst202302_msg031
rows.name:
Okay!
Let's all head for Luxuria!
